snippet.title: Unveiling our Latest Indie Horror Project
snippet.description:
ARE YOU READY FOR THE WORLD'S MOST EXTREME MEMORY TEST? 

Navigate hell in this horror game testing memory and observation; identify altered objects, place talismans, and escape demonic traps. Can you find your way out of this ever-changing nightmare?

In The Devil is in the Details, an indie first-person horror experience, you find yourself trapped in a hellish house. Each step forward is a gamble in this ever-changing nightmare, where no two playthroughs are alike. Your memory and observation skills are your only allies in a world where the devil himself manipulates your surroundings.
Wishlist it now on STEAM to be notified when the demo comes out!
